mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName ,P.MEMBER_ID AS memberId ,J.JOB_NAME AS jobName ,J.JOB_ID AS jobId FROM MEMBERS M JOIN MOIM_PARTICIPANTS P ON P.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID JOIN JOBS J ON P.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID WHERE M.MEMBER_ID IN (SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MOIM_PARTICIPANTS P WHERE P.MOIM_ID = #{id}) ORDER BY J.JOB_ID
